'''Portable Stove''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

Interacting with the Portable Stove opens the [[Cooking]] menu.
Unlike other items under the ''Tables'' subcategory, it is impossible to place any ornaments on the Portable Stove.

The blueprint for Portable Stove is obtainable from the [[Adeptal Mirror]].

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
